#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;

const int MAXN = 1e6 + 9;

LL N,K;
LL tim[MAXN];

inline bool isvalid(LL cur){
	LL cnt = 0LL;
	for(int i = 0;i < K;++i)
		cnt += (cur / tim[i]);

	return (cnt >= N);
}

int main (){
   scanf("%lld %lld",&K,&N);

   for(int i = 0;i < K;++i)
	 scanf("%lld",&tim[i]);

   LL lo = 0,hi = 1e16;
   while(lo < hi){
   	 LL md = (lo + hi) >> 1;
   	 if(isvalid(md)) hi = md;
   	 else lo = md + 1;
   }

   printf("%lld\n",hi);

  return 0;
}
